description: This file defines a React functional component 'TopBar' that serves as a top navigation/header bar for a web application. It displays connection status, user info, and controls for theme toggling and sign-out functionality.

methods.name: TopBar({ theme, onToggleTheme, isConnected })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the application's top bar with theme toggle and authentication controls.

methods.name: handleSignOut
methods.description: An asynchronous event handler that attempts to sign out the user using the signOut method from useAuth hook; logs a warning if sign-out fails.

ctags.name: TopBar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopBar({ theme, onToggleTheme, isConnected }) {$/
